title: List Purchase Lists
description: This API is to get the collection of purchase lists. It can also be used to return the list on a searched string and in a sorted order against various properties of purchase list.

q.description: The query string built as per the SCIM standards that helps to search entered string across purchase list properties like 'name’.

limit.description: The number of records limit in response

offset.description: The offset value to start from

sort.description: The parameter name to sort with and the sorting order eg. siteId:asc

listType.description: This field determines type of purchase lists to be fetched. Valid values for this field are owner and shared

shareType.description: This field determines sharing type of the shared purchase lists to be fetched. Its value can be account, email or all

shareAccountId.description: This field determines the account for which the shared purchase lists need to fetched. If not passed the current account (OR) parent account is taken, in that sequence. If ‘all’ is passed then, purchase list shared in all the accounts are returned.
